subject: Location (Details : {http://hl7.org/fhir/resource-types code 'Location' = 'Location', given as 'Location'})

date: Apr 6, 2020, 8:37:17 AM

publisher: SANER-IG

description: COVID-19 results from in-house laboratories. The federal government requests that these results should be reported to the Federal Emergency Management Agency (FEMA) using a standardized template by 5 p.m. ET each day, and reflect the results through midnight of the previous day. This Measure defines the Proportion (IPP,Denominator,Numerator only) counts for: - Percent Positive among Newly Resulted Tests - New Tests Resulted - New Positive COVID-19 Tests - Cumulative Percent Positive among Resulted Tests - Cumulative Tests Performed - Cumulative Positive COVID-19 Tests

name: FemaMeasurementGroupProportions
title: FEMA Measurement Group Proportions
description:
COVID-19 results from in-house laboratories. The federal government requests that these results should be reported to the Federal Emergency Management Agency (FEMA) using a standardized template by 5 p.m. ET each day, and reflect the results through midnight of the previous day. This Measure defines the Proportion (IPP,Denominator,Numerator only) counts for:
- Percent Positive among Newly Resulted Tests
  - New Tests Resulted
  - New Positive COVID-19 Tests
- Cumulative Percent Positive among Resulted Tests
  - Cumulative Tests Performed
  - Cumulative Positive COVID-19 Tests

relatedArtifact.display: FEMA Template for Daily Hospital COVID-19 Reporting

group.description: Percent Positive among Newly Resulted Tests: # of total positive results to released date / # of total test results released to date.

criteria.expression: Midnight to midnight cutoff, test results released on previous date queried.
Midnight to midnight cutoff, test results released on previous date queried.
Midnight to midnight cutoff, positive test results released on the previous date queried.

group.description: Cumulative Percent Positive among Resulted Tests: # of total positive results to released date / # of total tests results released to date

criteria.expression: All tests with results released to date.
All tests with results released to date.
All positivetest results released to date.
